completedCompanyActions.description: Cutting down on your flights and moving towards train travel has a significant impact on your carbon footprint.

requirements.description:
For domestic routes under five hours by train, take the train.
Railway stations are often more centrally located than airports, which makes arrival and departure easier and reduces the footprint of using taxis.  

Mark this action as completed as soon as you change your corporate travel policy accordingly.
requirements.title: Trains over planes policy

requirements.description:
For intercontinental travel, a seat in business class produces __two to three times__ as much CO2 as an economy seat. 
First-class seats even produce up to __six times__ as much CO2.

Mark this action as completed as soon as you change your corporate travel policy and make sure that you buy only economy class tickets from now on.
requirements.title: Economy class flights only

completedCompanyActions.title: Setup a policy for responsible business travel

completedCompanyActions.description: Meat and dairy consumption cause a lot of carbon emissions. By minimizing carbon-intensive food and drinks you can decrease your footprint significantly.

requirements.description:
Make sure that:
- you don't serve any meat
- you offer a plant-based milk option or serve only plant-based milk
- you minimize food waste
We can't control what people eat at home but, as a company, we can decide what to buy based on our values.

Some vegan and local catering providers for your reference: 
 [Pele Mele](http://www.pele-mele-berlin.de/catering/), [Fake Gourmet](https://www.facebook.com/fakegourmetberlin/), [Yummy Mummy](https://www.facebook.com/yummymummyberlin/?hc_location=ufi), [Goodies Deli](https://goodies-deli.com/pages/catering), [Hummus Dealer](https://www.facebook.com/hummusdealer/), [Beets and Roots](https://www.beetsandroots.de/catering), [My Goodness](https://www.mygoodnessberlin.com/), [No Tiers Vegan Catering](https://www.facebook.com/NoTiersVeganCatering/), [TRJFP](https://www.facebook.com/TRJFPBerlin/), [Gayaya](https://www.gayaya-berlin.de/en/home-en.html#catering-en), [Smunch](https://www.smunch.co/).
These projects are based in Berlin, but for those of you who are based elsewhere, they give you a general idea of what’s available and you can find similar options in your area.
 
Mark this action as completed if you do not  cater meat in your office and during business events.
requirements.title: Vegan catering and snacks
